name: PULSE
short_description:
Php User Login System Extended

Welcome to Pulse, a free and secure user management system written in PHP.
It can be used easily: it contains a basic web interface (100% customizable), an handy installer...and the engine, of course.

Pulse will make your life easier making you avoid wasting time on writing a login system for your application. 
The most frequently used features are already implemented into Pulse, so you can't help thinking about Machiavellian ways to realize your projects.

Even if Pulse is easy to use, it's strongly secure: it has on its side the power of MD5 and SHA-1 algorithms! Salted properly! 

Pulse is fully opensource, you may download and re-distribute the code in any form, a link back to the project would be appreciated, but is not required. Enjoy!

   ~ David, project leader
